org.jamsim.ascape
Class MultipleRunController

java.lang.Object
  org.ascape.model.event.DefaultScapeListener
      org.jamsim.ascape.MultipleRunController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, ScapeListener, HasName
public class MultipleRunController
extends DefaultScapeListener

Automatically rerun the simulation a specified number of times. Add this to a scape to enable multi run functionality.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Oliver Mannion
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

MultipleRunController

public MultipleRunController(org.apache.commons.lang.mutable.MutableInt numberRuns)
Run scape for numberRuns, closing the runner at the end of the run.

Parameters:
numberRuns - number of runs for the simulation. This is a MutableInt so it can be changed after construction.

MultipleRunController

public MultipleRunController(org.apache.commons.lang.mutable.MutableInt numberRuns,
                             boolean closeRunnerAtEnd)
Run scape for numberRuns.

Parameters:
numberRuns - number of runs for the simulation. This is a MutableInt so it can be changed after construction.
closeRunnerAtEnd - whether to close the runner at the end of the runs
Method Detail

scapeAdded

public void scapeAdded(ScapeEvent scapeEvent)
                throws TooManyListenersException
On scape add, set scape auto restart to false, as MultipleRunController sweep view will be handling scape control.

Specified by:
scapeAdded in interface ScapeListener
Overrides:
scapeAdded in class DefaultScapeListener
Parameters:
scapeEvent - the scape event
Throws:
